advisory.formatted:
Crop: Rice
Recommended Soil: Clay Loam
Current Soil: N/A
Soil Notes: N/A
Market Price: 0.8
Climate-Smart Tips:
- Practice alternate wetting and drying.
- Use drought-resistant varieties.
Care Instructions:
- Monitor for stem borers.
- Maintain proper water levels.

climate_smart_tips: Use zero tillage to conserve soil moisture.
Rotate crops to improve soil health.
care_instructions: Apply nitrogen fertilizer at tillering stage.
advisory.formatted:
Crop: Wheat
Recommended Soil: Loam
Current Soil: N/A
Soil Notes: N/A
Market Price: 1.1
Climate-Smart Tips:
- Use zero tillage to conserve soil moisture.
- Rotate crops to improve soil health.
Care Instructions:
- Apply nitrogen fertilizer at tillering stage.
- Irrigate at critical growth stages.

climate_smart_tips: Use raised beds in flood-prone areas.
advisory.formatted:
Crop: Maize
Recommended Soil: Well-drained Loam
Current Soil: N/A
Soil Notes: N/A
Market Price: 0.95
Climate-Smart Tips:
- Use raised beds in flood-prone areas.
- Apply organic manure before sowing.
Care Instructions:
- Thin seedlings to optimal spacing.
- Control weeds during early growth.
